atten4.ptxt: A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (See page ).

s2.ptxt: for Automatic Air Conditioning System:
Connect the connector.
Attach the 5 guides and 6 claws to install the upper instrument panel.
Install the 4 screws <A>.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL INSTRUMENT PANEL PASSENGER AIRBAG ASSEMBLY (w/ Front Passenger Airbag)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 12 claws to install the instrument panel passenger airbag.
Attach the clamp.
Install the 2 bolts.
Connect the connector.

atten3.ptxt: When handling the airbag connector, take care not to damage the airbag wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips to install the front pillar garnish.
Install the front door opening trim.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER FRONT PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws and 3 guides to install the lower front pillar garnish.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER FRONT PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 6 claws to install the instrument finish plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: for Manual Air Conditioning System:

s3.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to connect the air conditioning control.
Attach the 9 claws to install the center instrument cluster finish panel.

s2.ptxt: for Automatic Air Conditioning System:

s3.ptxt: Attach the 9 claws to install the center instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER LOWER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws and 2 clips to install the center lower instrument cluster finish panel.
Connect the connectors and attach the clamp.
Install the combination meter with the 3 screws in the order shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: w/ Light Control Rheostat:
Connect the connector.
Attach the 9 claws to install the No. 1 instrument cluster finish panel.
Install the clip <B>.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Attach the 7 claws to install the lower instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL (w/ Airbag System)

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: CHECK SRS WARNING LIGHT (w/ Airbag System)
